text: Create an image about a nature's instance infused with humor. Picture of a green frog, wearing clear swimming goggles sitting comfortably in an ordinary human situation. The scenario is set in a spacious kitchen, where the frog sits atop a wooden stool near a polished granite kitchen counter. It's attempting to reach a jar of cookies with one of its webbed feet while holding a porcelain cup of steaming tea in another. The kitchen has modern appliances, varnished mahogany cabinets adorned with silver handles and a skylight allowing a cascade of soft morning sunlight.
